message:
Don't forget to signup to help out at http://bit.ly/f1wOzW.  to borrow Jesse's words, this will help us get everything done smoothly and efficiently. And we
greatly appreciate the help.
Also, follow http://twitter.com/pycon  - keep your eye out for calls for volunteers while at the conference.
We could use a few more registration desk commitments (hint!)
Also check out http://us.pycon.org/2011/volunteer/onsite/ ;  following the link to http://us.pycon.org/2011/schedule/sessions/ we still need a few session chairs, and a bunch of session runners.
added name to the wiki - i'll be getting in on Tuesday evening. I'll be happy to help do registration desk stuff if you need that.
Deleted the mis rep there. Registered for helping registration wednesday am. Am not planning on attending PyCon (php dev) but love the idea of helping, hanging out.
Urgent need, session runner 4:15PM today - sign-up: http://bit.ly/h8RidK & let @dougnap or me know (we train).
